content:
In addition to the content already pre-applied in the CRD/DTR specifications, this query identifies trackers that contain changes that should be tested as part of connectathon development.

As well, the following 3 trackers are nominally approved but have been superseded by other tracker decisions and should NOT be included in connectathon development. (We'll need to revisit them in the new year.) FHIR#24714, FHIR#33226, and FHIR#34151
